mapper.select: SELECT A.SCRAP_NO , A.TITLE , A.CONT , A.IMG_SERVICE_URL || A.THUMBNAIL_SAVE_PATH || '/' || A.THUMBNAIL_FILE_NAME || '.' || A.IMG_FILE_EXT AS THUMBNAIL_IMG_URL , A.HITS , A.INSERT_USER_NO FROM TB_IMG_SCRAP_INFO A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.SCRAP_NO DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS TOT_CNT FROM TB_IMG_SCRAP_INFO A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.SCRAP_NO , A.TITLE , A.CONT , A.IMG_SERVICE_URL || A.IMG_SAVE_PATH || '/' || A.IMG_SAVE_FILE_NAME || '.' || A.IMG_FILE_EXT AS IMG_URL , A.HITS , A.INSERT_USER_NO FROM TB_IMG_SCRAP_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.SCRAP_NO = #{scrapNo}
